name: Arcane Legend
description:
Arcane Legend is a 2D/3D hybrid, top-down shmup with a twist. Players take the role of a wizard, on a quest to save his medieval fantasy kingdom from invading hordes of darkness that have captured the heir to the throne.

Players will encounter unique locations and villains with their own strengths and weaknesses. Player’s will need to use the powers of thunder, air, fire and water to destroy their enemies, from minions and bosses alike, and employ strategy to use the best spell for the situation.
